articles.title: M3 MacBook Air Peak CPU Temperature Can Reach 114 Degrees Celcius, 33% Slower Than MacBook Pro With Same Chip Due To Lack Of A Fan - Wccftech
articles.description: The lack of a cooling fan on the M3 MacBook Air has severe consequences, as it throttles due to extremely high temperatures
articles.content: Apple continues to employ a fan-less cooling design for 13-inch and 15-inch M3 MacBook Air models, and while that means users will be pleased about the completely silent operation, they will lose out… [+2795 chars]

articles.title: Fortnite's new season is delayed due to tech issues - Engadget
articles.description: Epic Games has delayed the start of the new Fortnite season due to a technical issue. The latest season focuses on Greek gods.
